data.lyric:
[ti:Privilege]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:My Dear Melancholy,]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Privilege (Explicit) - The Weeknd
[00:21.32]Enjoy your privileged life
[00:23.89]
[00:26.55]'Cause I'm not gonna hold you through the night
[00:30.97]
[00:31.68]We said our last goodbyes
[00:34.25]
[00:36.85]So let's just try to end it with a smile
[00:41.90]
[00:43.39]And I don't wanna hear that you are suffering
[00:46.96]
[00:48.14]You are suffering no more
[00:52.25]
[00:53.75]'Cause I held you down when you were suffering
[00:57.17]
[00:58.26]You were suffering
[01:00.33]
[01:01.56]Lose your way way way
[01:05.30]
[01:06.33]I got two red pills to take the blues away
[01:10.35]
[01:11.79]Blues away way way
[01:15.63]
[01:16.53]I got two red pills to take the blues away
[01:20.27]
[01:21.47]And I'ma f**k the pain away and I know I'll be okay
[01:24.59]
[01:26.66]They said our love is just a game I don't care what they say
[01:29.60]
[01:31.68]But I'ma drink the pain away I'll be back to my old ways
[01:35.19]
[01:36.74]And I got two red pills to take the blues away oh
[01:42.72]
[02:08.43]I don't wanna hear that no more no more
[02:13.27]No more no more
data.trans:
[ti:Privilege]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:My Dear Melancholy,]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:21.32]畅享你的尊贵生活吧
[00:23.89]
[00:26.55]因为我再也不会在夜晚拥你入眠
[00:30.97]
[00:31.68]我们已经道了永别
[00:34.25]
[00:36.85]所以不如我们以微笑结束
[00:41.90]
[00:43.39]我不想听到你受伤害的消息
[00:46.96]
[00:48.14]你再也不会受伤了
[00:52.25]
[00:53.75]因为若你遭受伤痛 我会为你抵挡
[00:57.17]
[00:58.26]当你遭受磨难
[01:00.33]
[01:01.56]迷失方向
[01:05.30]
[01:06.33]我会用两个红色药片 将悲伤痛苦全部带走
[01:10.35]
[01:11.79]将悲伤痛苦全部带走
[01:15.63]
[01:16.53]我会用两个红色药片 将悲伤痛苦全部带走
[01:20.27]
[01:21.47]我会将痛苦驱散 我知道我能行
[01:24.59]
[01:26.66]人们说我们的爱情只是一场游戏 我不在意他们说什么
[01:29.60]
[01:31.68]但我会将痛苦的酒水一饮而尽 再过回从前的生活
[01:35.19]
[01:36.74]我会用两个红色药片 将悲伤痛苦全部带走
[01:42.72]
[02:08.43]我再也不想听了 再也不想
[02:13.27]再也不想 再也不想
